nodes.text: A clone tank gunner was stationed in the Bothawui system in 22 BBY during the events of the Clone Wars.

Piloting an AT-TE walker, the trooper participated in the Battle of Bothawui under command of clone trooper captain Rex. During the battle, he was part of a squadron of clones deployed to Bothawui Prime's asteroid belt in order to outflank the incoming Separatist warships under command of General Grievous. As the battle began, the clones managed to outflank the enemy vessels and with the help of the Republic warships which attacked the enemy from the front, they managed to win the battle.
